amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding to Pakistan from $900 million to $700 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 114-623 to cut funding to Pakistan from $900 million to $700 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 230 (Roll no. 312).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 230 (Roll no. 312).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Poe (TX).
